name: Students' horrible stories FIN
description:
Five Independent incidents. One shadow that penetrates everything.


Students' horrible stories FIN is a horror game created with RPG Maker XP.
Experience the charm of various characters as you progress through a organized story.
Follow the directions of 'The Presenter' and move toward a 'True End' where 'Everyone' becomes 'HAPPY'.

As the title suggests, it's a game that confronts an unknown horror, centered on students, not adults. Find out what threatens the innocent students and how to resist them. Depending on the Guest's choice, it may be closer or farther away from the 'True End'. But don't worry. If you don't give up, you can surely achieve your goal. Now, why don't you head for the 'True End', which is a common goal with me?
- Iseru, The Presenter


There is no coincidence in all incidents.
- ???

Creator comment

If you want to translate this game into English, please send an e-mail, in korean.
If it is determined that there is no one to translate, I will translate it by myself.
